title: "Quantum Geometrics"
content:
# Quantum Geometrics

Welcome to Quantum Geometrics, a website dedicated to exploring the intersection of quantum computing and geometric design. Our website features a stunning wallpaper inspired by the shape of a quantum computer, in shades of purple and pink.

At Quantum Geometrics, we believe that the beauty of mathematics and science can be expressed through art and design. Our website showcases a collection of geometric designs that draw inspiration from the principles of quantum computing, such as superposition and entanglement.

Whether you're a quantum computing enthusiast or simply appreciate beautiful design, we invite you to explore our collection of wallpapers and discover the fascinating world of quantum geometrics.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A geometric design in shades of purple and pink, inspired by the shape of a quantum computer"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
